description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Tree Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Tree Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fit a piping bag with a closed star piping tip. Starting from the outside, gently pipe buttercream around cupcake and up on itself two and a half times to create tree shape. Top with a star and use writing icing to create tinsel. Finish with silver balls from Glamour & Sparkle Mix.
